mapper.select:
select d.id, d.name, d.note, d.type, d.user_id, connection_params, d.create_time, d.update_time , u.user_name as user_name from t_ds_datasource d join t_ds_user u on d.user_id = u.id where 1 =1
and d.id in (select datasource_id from t_ds_relation_datasource_user where user_id=#{userId} union select id as datasource_id from t_ds_datasource where user_id=#{userId} )
and name like concat ('%', #{name}, '%')
order by update_time desc
